LanguageData.VWE_RecoilOpMechanism.label: recoil-Op mechanism
LanguageData.VWE_RecoilOpMechanism.description: This weapon fires a rapid 3-round burst. The uncontrollable recoil limits the weapon's effective range and severely reduces accuracy at medium and long distances.
LanguageData.VWE_BuntlineBarrel.label: buntline barrel
LanguageData.VWE_BuntlineBarrel.description: This weapon features an extended barrel that significantly increases range and accuracy. However, the added weight makes the weapon slower to aim.
LanguageData.VWE_SnakeShotLoads.label: snake-shot loads
LanguageData.VWE_SnakeShotLoads.description: This weapon fires spread-shot pellets instead of solid slugs. It provides a major accuracy boost at close range, but deals less damage and has zero armor penetration.
LanguageData.VWE_TopBreakAction.label: top-break action
LanguageData.VWE_TopBreakAction.description: This weapon features a hinged frame that breaks open for rapid casing ejection. It reloads significantly faster than a standard model, but the mechanism makes the weapon fragile and prone to breaking.
